resources.string: This app was designed and coded by Lara Ruffle Coles

Jacobean building in the south-east London suburb of Charlton. 

Built in 1612 during the reign of James I for his son Prince Henry's tutor Sir Adam Newton. Presumed to have been designed by John Thorpe.
